    SearchChunkForBlockTask
     
    SearchChunksExploreTask
    Searches/explores a continuous "blob" of chunks, attempting to load in ALL nearby chunks that are part of this "blob" You must define a function that determines whether a chunk is to be included within this "blob".
    SearchWithinBiomeTask
    Explores/Loads all chunks of a biome.
